lead_paragraph: Tony Dorsett, the college and pro football Hall of Famer, said he would not discourage young players from taking up the game even as he battles brain disease.

headline.main: Dorsett Doesn’t Blame Sport for His Illness
headline.print_headline: Dorsett Doesn’t Blame Sport for His Illness

snippet: Tony Dorsett, the college and pro football Hall of Famer, said he would not discourage young players from taking up the game even as he battles brain disease.
